name: treatment of used locomotive | used locomotive | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2539/documentation

The data is based on the bulk material composition of the RE 460, a locomotive which is currently used for goods transportation in Switzerland and also in Germany. The life span of the locomotive Re 460 is assumed to be 40 years resulting in a life time performance of 9.6 Mio. kilometres. ;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



The inventory includes waste treatment processes for non metal components of a locomotive. For the transport of disposed materials standard distances have been applied.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data represents a locomotive currently in operation
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represents Swiss and German conditions
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data  for Switzerland is used as an estimate for Europe This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data based on expert estimate on the material consumption of a locomotive.
